This should be absorbed by MDM related subtype - either Vat or Stock
D) We can move to vat if wanted. I thought this was a removable cart component distinct from the MDM on the 6k/7ks. Is this different for this machine?
T)Â  Vat is only removable on 6Ks but even on a 6k it makes no sense to think of them as separate entities. The "vat" on a 6k is a metal bucket. Everything is in the MDM (or Cart, as you call it).

Marco Chen: Yes, we would like it to be volume (ml).

hydra_schema.native_code: Laser Power Too Low To Start

mtconnect_schema.name: Fault-Laser-Power-Low
mtconnect_schema.message: Unable to set max power to read fad after 5 attempts.

hydra_schema.notes: No ability to know whether its front or rear sensor not being reached
There are eight possible versions of the message. Each message prefixed by either Large or Small, then each message refers to the 1/2, 1, 2, or 4 mil sensor
